Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored 31 points on 11-of-29 shooting and had 12 assists against the Cavs.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball said he didn’t mean to offend anyone with a comment the NBA said was “offensive and derogatory” while slapping him with a $100,000 fine.
LaMelo Ball made his first comments since the fine was assessed.
Charles Lee said he had spoken to Ball, who had been “very apologetic” and intended to learn from the behavior.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball is averaging 29.6 points, 6.3 assists and 5.3 rebounds in his fifth season.
Ball was Rookie of the Year in 2020-21 and an All-Star the following season.
Others: The Charlotte Hornets lost 128-114 to the unbeaten Cavaliers.
